captions.text:
Grab your NES wallet and hop into this $49,950
Batman Tumbler themed golf cart because it's
time to go shopping for Game LUT.

As you exit the batman golf cart at the Vsauce
Shopping Center, your My Neighbor Totoro flip

flops slap against the pavement, that Chocobo
flask you had in your lap falls onto the ground...you

pick it up, tuck in your Dragon Ball Master
Roshi shirt, zip up your Pewter Gym hoodie,

buckle your Marvel Belt and grab an Assassin's
Creed 4 Cutlass replica because shopping can
be dangerous.

Walking down the aisles you notice some Legend
of Zelda his & her towels, and an awesome

Link Pixel Sword and Shield Necklace. They
even snap together. Donna would have loved

that. You remember that night like it was
last night...which it was. She was wearing

Charmander earrings and a glow in the dark
forest spirit necklace. You were driving with

a Godzilla Hoodie over your eyes, making it
hard to see.

You also had a few bottles of Devil's Kiss
from BioShock Infinite earlier, who could

blame ya, you did just win an awesome Teenage
Mutant Ninja Turtles Pizza Cutter in trivia.

But it was dark that night, raining, you lost
control.

You wake up face down on a pillow of BMO dressed
as Thor...it's weird. You're wearing a really

cool Mega-Man shirt that you don't remember
buying. You look over and see a Samus Helmet

backpack bursting at the seams. You unzip
it and lay all that LUT out onto your Super

Nintendo Controller table, and all those bad
memories wash away cus I gotta tell ya, the

Zapper Lamp in the corner is a nice touch.
But what really ties the room together are
these awesome prints by The Pixel Empire...

While surveying your LUT you notice an incredible
laser etched portal gun light, hand carved

crayons from Wax Nostalgic that have been
made into characters like Darth Vader, No

Face, and Princess Bubblebum. If you want
to carve your own, just use this League of

Legends Weapon set. Block any of the shavings
from hitting your body by wearing a Dawn of

Stormwind World of Warcraft coat or an Assassin's
Creed Hooded Cardigan. For extra protection

you can don this leather Steampunk Batman
Cowl.

Now let's take a moment to check out some
awesome figures!

If you need a little change in your life there
is a Sega Mega Drive that transforms into

Megatron. Sega Mega Megatron. Defeat that
titan with a great Mikasa figure from Attack

on Titan, or for something a bit cuter there
are these vinyl ones from Animal Crossing.

For that mass effect get this limited edition
21inch Garrus Statue or this incredible one
from Skies of Arcadia...

But you could catch them all with Pokemon
Trainer Red.

With all this LUT, you must be makin it wayne...tshirt.
Links to everything can be found in the description

below. I'm Jake and, as always, thanks for
watching.

title: Awesome Legend of Zelda Necklace! -- Game LÜT #25
